text: Kare koso wa anata gata o riku ni, mata umi ni tabi o sa se rareru okatadearu. Sorede anata gataga funeninoru-ji, sore ga jun kazeninotte kōkō sureba, kare-ra wa sore de yorokobu. Bōfū ga osou to, ōnami ga yomo kara oshiyose, kare-ra wa mō kore madeda to kan'nen shite, arrā ni mukatte, shinjin o tsukushite inoru. `Anata ga, moshi watashi-tachi o korekara sukui kudasareba, kanarazu kansha o sasageru mono ni narimasu
